messages.subject: dog seizures
messages.msgSnippet: Opps!  Sorry gang I accidently hit the send button without a message. Randi, In reply about the dog seizures I read in the April 1999 issue of The Whole Dog
messages.messageBody:
Opps! Sorry gang I accidently hit the send button without a message.

Randi,
In reply about the dog seizures I read in the April 1999 issue of The
Whole Dog Journal that a daily dose of a 1/2 teaspoon of dolomite will
do the trick. You may also want to consider feeding your pets a raw
food diet. http://www.geocities.com/HotSprings/1158/animals.htm
This is an excellent site!!
You may even want to reconsider the yearly pet vaccinations. My breeder
just sent me an article on this issue, which was very enlightening.
I hope that you find this helpful!
Robin
(also a newbie to the list)

<<I haven't even introduced myself.... and I don't really know if this
is
the
right list to ask this question.... =) So please don't be angry with
me if
its not.....
I have a dog that is having seizures.... not very often though. The
last
one was over 2 months ago and very short. He just had one, and it lasted
for like 2-3 minutes.... is there anything anyone can suggest???
Herbs,
oils????
Thanks,
Randi ^i^>>
